pr_title: Add support for configuring additional dependencies in @QuarkusProdModeTest

timeline.message: Move remainder of kubernetes maven invoker style tests to @QuarkusProdModeTest

timeline.bodyText: Could you please also renamed the argument name to forcedDependencies?
timeline.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: Ah, I was hoping the IDE would do it automatically and I was apparently wrong :). Fixed now
replies.author: geoand
